sentences.sContent: I just missed my flight to Chicago. When’s the next one?
sentences.sCn: 我刚错过去芝加哥的航班。下一班是几点钟？

sentences.sContent: We’ll look at the proposals at the next meeting.
sentences.sCn: 下一次会议我们要研究一下这些提议。

sentences.sContent: Over the next couple of months, try to relax more and get more exercise.
sentences.sCn: 接下来的几个月里，要尽量多放松、多运动。

synos.tran: 下一个的；其次的；贴近的

phrases.pCn: [美国俚语]博得某人欢心；(尤指在性关系上)与某人相契，熟识某人

trans.tranOther: the next event, day, time etc is the one that happens after the present one, or the previous one
